meta.title: Visa Requirements for {destination}
meta.description: Complete visa information for {destination}. Find {visaCount} visa options, processing times, fees, and requirements for your travel to {destination}.
meta.ogDescription: Everything you need to know about visiting {destination}. {visaCount} visa types available with detailed requirements and processing information.
meta.twitterDescription: Complete visa requirements and travel guide for {destination}

visaOptions.title: Visa Options
visaOptions.description: Explore all available visa types for {destination}. Each option includes detailed requirements, fees, and processing times.
visaOptions.noVisaTypesDescription: We're currently updating visa information for {destination}. Please check back soon or contact us for assistance.

visaCard.interviewDescription: An in-person or virtual interview may be required as part of the application process.

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.passportDescription: Valid for at least 6 months from travel date with blank pages
documents.applicationDescription: Fully completed and signed visa application form
documents.photoDescription: Recent passport-size photographs meeting official requirements
documents.financialDescription: Bank statements, employment letter, or proof of financial support
documents.interviewDescription: A consular interview may be scheduled as part of the application process. Prepare all required documents and be ready to discuss your travel plans.
documents.documentNote: Requirements may vary based on your nationality and specific circumstances. Always verify current requirements with the nearest consulate.

visaFree.title: Visa-Free & Visa on Arrival
visaFree.visaFreeDescription: Citizens of certain countries can visit {destination} without obtaining a visa in advance. Check if your passport qualifies for visa-free entry.
visaFree.visaOnArrivalDescription: Some travelers can obtain their visa upon arrival at {destination}. This convenient option eliminates the need for advance processing.

relatedContent.title: Travel Guides & Articles
relatedContent.description: Discover travel tips, attractions, and insider guides for {destination}.
